title: Why Being Perfect Will Ruin You | Rangan Chatterjee on Health Theory
description: Functional Medicine Practitioner and author of How to Make Disease Disappear, Rangan Chatterjee, joins Tom on this week’s episode of Health Theory. Dr. Chatterjee explains his four pillars of health and why balance across the four, rather than perfection in one, is essential.   ButcherBox.
